021
022import net.kyori.adventure.audience.Audience;
023import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
024import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.MiniMessage;
025import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029
030import java.util.UUID;
031
032/**
033 * The core class for translating plugin messages
034 *
035 * @author creatorfromhell
036 * @since 0.1.2.0
037 */
038public class MessageHandler {
039
040  public static final MiniMessage MINI_MESSAGE = MiniMessage.miniMessage();
041  final TranslationProvider translator;
042
043  private static MessageHandler instance;
044
045  public MessageHandler(final TranslationProvider translator) {
046    this.translator = translator;
047
048    instance = this;
049  }
050
051  public MessageHandler(final TranslationProvider translator, final TagResolver... resolvers) {
052    this.translator = translator;
053
054    instance = this;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Used to translate a message for a player and return the translated {@link Component}.
059   *
060   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
061   * @param player The {@link PlayerProvider player} to translate this for.
062   *
063   * @return The {@link Component} that is the result of the translation process of the message for
064   * the given player.
065   */
066  public static Component grab(final MessageData messageData, @NotNull final PlayerProvider player) {
067    return MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(PluginCore.server().replacePlaceholder(player.identifier(), instance.translator.translate(player.identifier(), messageData)));
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Used to translate a message for a player and return the translated {@link Component}.
072   *
073   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
074   * @param id The {@link UUID unique identifier} of the player to translate this for.
075   *
076   * @return The {@link Component} that is the result of the translation process of the message for
077   * the given player.
078   */
079  public static Component grab(final MessageData messageData, @NotNull final UUID id) {
080    return MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(PluginCore.server().replacePlaceholder(id, instance.translator.translate(id, messageData)));
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Used to translate a message for an {@link Audience}.
085   *
086   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
087   * @param audience The audience that should receive the translated message.
088   */
089  public static void translate(final MessageData messageData, final UUID identifier, final Audience audience) {
090    final String msg = PluginCore.server().replacePlaceholder(identifier, instance.translator.translateNode(messageData, "default"));
091
092    if(identifier == null) {
093
094      if(!msg.isEmpty()) {
095
096        audience.sendMessage(MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(msg));
097      }
098      return;
099    }
100
101    if(!msg.isEmpty()) {
102
103      audience.sendMessage(MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(msg));
104    }
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Used to translate a message for numerous players.
109   *
110   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
111   * @param audiences The audiences that should receive the translated message.
112   */
113  public static void translate(final MessageData messageData, final UUID identifier, final Audience... audiences) {
114
115    final String msg = PluginCore.server().replacePlaceholder(identifier, instance.translator.translateNode(messageData, "default"));
116    if(msg.isEmpty()) {
117      return;
118    }
119
120    for(final Audience a : audiences) {
121      a.sendMessage(MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(msg));
122    }
123  }
124
125  public MiniMessage getMini() {
126    return MINI_MESSAGE;
127  }
128
129  public TranslationProvider getTranslator() {
130    return translator;
131  }
132
133  public static MessageHandler getInstance() {
134    return instance;
135  }
136}
